meta.title: Aura Reading - What Color Is Your Aura? | DopaBrain
meta.description: What color is your aura? Answer 10 dreamy questions to discover your energy color. 8 unique aura types with personality analysis. Share your result!
meta.keywords: aura test, aura color, energy reading, personality test, aura quiz, spiritual test
meta.og_title: What Color Is Your Aura? - 8 Aura Types
meta.og_description: Close your eyes and breathe. What color do you see? Take this 10-question quiz to discover your aura color!
meta.twitter_title: What Color Is Your Aura? - Aura Reading Quiz
meta.twitter_description: Discover your aura color with 10 dreamy questions!

intro.title: What Color Is Your Aura?
intro.subtitle: Discover the energy that surrounds you
intro.description: Answer 10 dreamy questions to reveal your aura color.
intro.description_2: Uncover your hidden energy, strengths, and compatible auras!

q1.text: When you close your eyes and breathe deeply, what do you see?
q1.opt1: Endless deep ocean stretching to the horizon
q1.opt2: A sunlit meadow full of wildflowers

q2.text: A stranger sits next to you and starts crying. What is your instinct?
q2.opt0: I feel their pain deeply and want to comfort them
q2.opt1: I analyze the situation to offer practical help
q2.opt2: I try to brighten their mood with warmth and humor
q2.opt3: I respect their space but silently send good energy

q3.text: What kind of weather speaks to your soul?
q3.opt1: Gentle rain on a window -- calming and introspective
q3.opt2: Golden sunset painting the sky in warm hues
q3.opt3: Misty morning fog -- mysterious and serene

q4.text: If your life were a piece of music, what would it sound like?
q4.opt0: An epic orchestral symphony -- grand and passionate
q4.opt1: A haunting piano melody -- deep and emotional
q4.opt2: Nature sounds mixed with soft chimes -- peaceful
q4.opt3: Electronic ambient music -- futuristic and unique

q5.text: You find an ancient locked box. What do you do?
q5.opt0: Break it open immediately -- I need to know
q5.opt1: Study the lock, find the key methodically
q5.opt2: Hold it close and try to feel what is inside
q5.opt3: Leave it. Some secrets are meant to stay hidden

q6.text: What drains your energy the most?
q6.opt0: Being stuck in routine with no excitement
q6.opt1: Shallow conversations that never go deep
q6.opt3: Being forced to conform and hide who I am

q7.text: You wake up with a superpower. Which one resonates most?

q8.text: What is your relationship with solitude?
q8.opt0: I crave it -- alone time is when I recharge
q8.opt1: I like balance -- some alone, some social
q8.opt2: I prefer company but enjoy quiet reflection
q8.opt3: I am energized by people -- the more the better

q9.text: A dream keeps repeating. What is it about?
q9.opt0: Flying through aurora-lit skies over mountains
q9.opt1: Diving into a luminous underwater kingdom
q9.opt2: Dancing in a rose garden under starlight
q9.opt3: Standing at the edge of a volcano, unafraid

q10.text: Choose the word that feels most like home:

ruby.name: Ruby Red
ruby.description: Your aura burns with Ruby Red -- the color of raw passion, courage, and unstoppable drive. You are a natural-born leader who inspires others through sheer force of personality. Your energy is magnetic: when you walk into a room, people feel it. You live boldly, love fiercely, and refuse to settle for anything less than extraordinary.

ocean.name: Ocean Blue
ocean.description: Your aura radiates Ocean Blue -- the color of infinite depth, wisdom, and emotional intelligence. Like the ocean itself, you have calm surfaces but incredible depth beneath. You see through facades and understand people on a level that others cannot. Your mind is your greatest asset, and your empathy runs deep as the sea.

golden.name: Golden Yellow
golden.description: Your aura shines with Golden Yellow -- the color of sunshine, creativity, and boundless optimism. You are the person who lights up every room and makes the impossible seem achievable. Your creative mind sees beauty and possibility everywhere. People are drawn to your warmth like sunflowers turning toward the sun.

emerald.name: Emerald Green
emerald.description: Your aura glows with Emerald Green -- the color of healing, growth, and deep connection with nature. You possess a rare gift: the ability to make others feel safe, heard, and restored. Like an ancient forest, your presence is grounding and restorative. You heal not through words alone, but through the pure warmth of your being.

violet.name: Violet Purple
violet.description: Your aura pulses with Violet Purple -- the color of spiritual awakening, intuition, and cosmic consciousness. You exist between worlds, sensing truths that others overlook. Your intuition is uncannily accurate, and you often know things before they happen. You are drawn to the mysteries of existence and find meaning where others see chaos.

crystal.name: Crystal White
crystal.description: Your aura gleams with Crystal White -- the color of clarity, purity, and perfect balance. You are a rare soul who embodies harmony in all things. Like a crystal prism, you take in the energies around you and transform them into something beautiful. Your clarity of purpose and inner peace are your greatest gifts to the world.

nebula.name: Nebula Pink
nebula.description: Your aura swirls with Nebula Pink -- the color of romantic dreams, artistic beauty, and tender love. You experience the world through a lens of wonder and beauty that most people lose after childhood. Your imagination is vast as a nebula, birthing new stars of creativity. You love deeply, dream vividly, and create beauty wherever you go.

obsidian.name: Obsidian Black
obsidian.description: Your aura emanates Obsidian Black -- the color of independence, mystery, and visionary power. You walk your own path and refuse to be defined by others. Like obsidian forged in volcanic fire, you have been shaped by intense experiences into something unbreakable. Your depth and complexity make you endlessly fascinating to those who earn your trust.
